text: "Lucky Me, Lucky You" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Lee Roy Parnell. It was released in April 1997 as the first single from the album Every Night's a Saturday Night. The song reached #35 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart. The song was written by Parnell and Gary Nicholson. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1997) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|57 |} ==References== Category:1997 singles Category:1997 songs Category:Lee Roy Parnell songs Category:Songs written by Gary Nicholson Category:Songs written by Lee Roy Parnell Category:Arista Nashville singles
title: Lucky Me, Lucky You
